title: The iPad has never been this cheap and you’d be crazy to pass it up
content:
Macworld

It might have an old chip and an old design, but Apple’s 9th-gen iPad is still a great tablet for $329, but it’s even better when it’s on sale. The sale price is usually $279, but Amazon is cutting the price even more for Black Friday: You can get the 64GB iPad for $230, a savings of $99 and the best price we’ve ever seen for this model.

The 9th-gen iPad has a 10.2-inch display, an A13 Bionic processor, and a 12MP Ultra Wide camera with Center Stage. It’s the only iPad that still has Apple’s classic Home button design and a Lightning port, but it’s still one of the best tablets you can buy for kids, students, and anyone else looking for a lightweight tablet for games, movies, and work.

We’ll be tracking Apple sales all week, but we don’t think we’ll see an iPad deal better than this. So go grab one before it’s gone forever.
